Daniel Clifford

Verified Graduate

I recieved a job offer mid-course,and the subjects I learned were current,if not more so,in the company I joined.I honestly feel I got every penny's worth.

"I was an EMT for many Years before I joined the bootcamp.I've been looking to make a transition and have heard some people who had an amazing experience here.I signed up for free intro course and found it incredibly fun!i enrolled shortly thereafter.The next 12 weeks was the best-and most grueling-time of my life.Since completing the course.i've successfully switched careers,working as a Software Engineer at a VR startup."
